__TOC__

The initiative to interview approved LoCo Teams is underway. Below is the table that is being used and will be update as more teams become approved teams.  You will also be able to see the tentative schedule for these interviews as well.  Please feel free to update the questions, or add comments or concerns.  Likewise, if you know of some motivated LoCo Members who are don't have a lot on their plates and are looking for a way to get involved please let me know and this LoCo interview series can be a great way to get started as well as get to know many people in the Ubuntu Community.

Thanks - <nowiki>[[AmberGraner | akgraner]]</nowiki>
